item.title: 'Legend dairy' man carries ice cream, dry ice up Colorado peak as treat for hikers
item.description: Hikers who climbed one of Colorado's tallest mountains got more than a sweeping view at the top

item.title: Gun store owner: Shooter who killed 2 showed no warning signs before attack
item.description: The shooter who killed two children and injured 21 others at a Minneapolis church was seen on video visiting a gun shop the weekend before the attack

item.title: New Hampshire boy, 13, reels in 177-pound halibut while deep-sea fishing that may be a world record
item.description: A New Hampshire teenager on a deep sea fishing trip may have set a world record by reeling in a fish that weighs more than himself

item.title: Police kill a man in a burning Georgia house, finding a woman dead and others trapped
item.description: Police in an Atlanta suburb have shot and killed a man inside a burning house

item.title: For decades, US Open women's champs got a smaller replica trophy than the men. Now they're equal
item.description: For decades, U.S. Open women's singles champions received a replica trophy that was much smaller than the ones the men's title winners were allowed to...
